alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 19 at 3:09PM AKST until January 20 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...COLD WIND CHILLS ON THE KLONDIKE HIGHWAY AND PERIODS OF FREEZING DRIZZLE EXPECTED FOR THE UPPER ELEVATIONS OF PRINCE OF WALES ISLAND AND NORTH OF KETCHIKAN... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...higher elevations of the Klondike highway in the Municipality of Skagway. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coldest wind chills will be on the Klondike Highway near White Pass.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
